## Builder.group() method

Adds a button group control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
group(label: string, builder: (b: Builder) => void): GroupModel & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  label | <code>string</code> | The group label |
|  builder | <code>(b: Builder) =&gt; void</code> | A callback allowing to build sub controls |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GroupModel & Removable`
